sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { View, Text, TouchableHighlight } from 'react-native'
import NavigationBar from '../components/NavigationBar'

export default function NightTimePage() {
  return (
    <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
      <View style={{ flex: 9 }}>
        <View style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: '#cc0066' }}>
          <Text>
            “Mm, ahem, this is a school announcement. It is now 10 p.m. As such, it is officially nighttime.
            Okay then… sweet dreams, everyone! Good night, sleep tight, don’t let the bed bugs bite…”
            \n
            Press button below when ready
          </Text>
          <Text>
            Traitors - Wake up. Press the button below to reveal whoe the Blackened player is
          </Text>
          <Text>
            Blackened - Wake up. Place the bullet card in front of the player you would like to attack. On Night 0,
            the victim will only lose an item card and not be killed. Press the button below when you are done
          </Text>
        </View>
        <View style={{ flex: 1, flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: 'white' }}>
          <TouchableHighlight style={{ width: '100%', height: '100%', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }} onPress={() => {}}>
            <Text>Click Me</Text>
          </TouchableHighlight>
        </View>
      </View>
      <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
        <NavigationBar previousPage='ItemsPage' nextPage=''></NavigationBar>
      </View>
    </View>
  )
}
